sqlQuery.name: AllVariables
sqlQuery.sql: select distinct sd.dataset_id, ag.stable_id as attribute_id from eda.AttributeGraph ag, eda.Attribute a, eda.EntityTypeGraph etg, apidbTuning.StudyIdDatasetId sd where ag.stable_id = a.stable_id and a.entity_type_id = etg.entity_type_id and etg.study_stable_id = sd.study_stable_id

sqlQuery.name: All
sqlQuery.sql: select distinct sd.dataset_id, ag.stable_id as attribute_id, ag.display_name as attribute_name, ag.provider_label, studyName.study_name, etg.display_name as entity_type from eda.AttributeGraph ag, eda.Attribute a, eda.EntityTypeGraph etg, apidbTuning.StudyIdDatasetId sd, eda.Study s, (select sc.value as study_name, sc.study_id from eda.StudyCharacteristic sc, sres.OntologyTerm studyNameTerm where sc.attribute_id = studyNameTerm.ontology_term_id and studyNameTerm.source_id = 'OBI_0001622' -- investigation title ) studyName where ag.stable_id = a.stable_id and a.entity_type_id = etg.entity_type_id and etg.study_stable_id = sd.study_stable_id and ag.study_id = studyName.study_id(+) and ag.study_id = s.study_id and s.stable_id = etg.study_stable_id -- problem rows and (sd.dataset_id != 'DS_010e5612b8' or ag.stable_id != 'EUPATH_0035128' or etg.display_name != 'Household') and (sd.dataset_id != 'DS_0086998c2f' or ag.stable_id != 'EUPATH_0033193' or etg.display_name != 'Participant repeated measure')

sqlQuery.name: Values
sqlQuery.sql: select distinct sd.dataset_id, av.attribute_stable_id as attribute_id, av.string_value as value from eda.AttributeValue av, eda.EntityTypeGraph etg, apidbTuning.StudyIdDatasetId sd where av.entity_type_id = etg.entity_type_id and etg.study_stable_id = sd.study_stable_id and av.number_value is null and av.date_value is null and lower(av.string_value) != 'yes' and lower(av.string_value) != 'no'
